timeline.message:
Add /votebook command
* Allows users to spawn a new vote book if lost or joining after vote has begun

Signed-off-by: applenick <applenick@users.noreply.github.com>

timeline.bodyText: Maybe a message if you try to do /votebook during a match? We should have a generic You can not use this command while the match is running anyway IMO.
timeline.author: KingOfSquares

replies.bodyText: The sendBook method already does that, it says something like There is nothing to vote for at this time, so no need to add an additional message to the command 😄
replies.author: applenick
